subject: Coaches and Managers
Football
lead_paragraph: Bruce Arians, who was the A.P. coach of the year as the Colts’ interim coach last season, is only one reason the Arizona Cardinals are 7-4 and riding a four-game winning streak.
snippet: Bruce Arians, who was the A.P. coach of the year as the Colts’ interim coach last season, is only one reason the Arizona Cardinals are 7-4 and riding a four-game winning streak.
